tool.name: write
tool.description:
Create or overwrite a file with the specified content.
Features: - Creates parent directories if they don't exist - Returns a diff showing the changes - Works with both new files and existing files
IMPORTANT: - For partial edits, use the 'edit' tool instead - This tool completely replaces file content - Use this for creating new files or complete rewrites

parameters.parameter: The absolute path to the file to write (must be within project root)
The complete content to write to the file
